data.text: @ajlamesa @angrybklynmom @nytimes and what about Flint? Are those schools open yet ??

@brimetimenole @nytimes yup, i know. it's very sad that the @nytimes is still trying to suggest closing schools is an effective way to reduce transmission once community transmission is already present. dishonest reporting.
@ajlamesa @nytimes Yeah, I was definitely being sarcastic.
@brimetimenole @nytimes just an inaccurate way of framing the decisions in those cities
@ajlamesa @nytimes That strategy worked so well! Likely hundreds of lives saved by keeping kids home to control Omicron.

@ajlamesa @nytimes Ha!  Well, if The NY Times says it, then it must be true. 

Atlanta City Schools are 💯 controlled by Democratic politics.  One board member is the Treasurer of the Democratic Party of Georgia, and heâ€™s actively running for State Senate.  I could go on all day.  Pure politics
@ajlamesa @angrybklynmom @nytimes And @DeKalbSchools run by @CWATSONHARRIS also closed for the same stated reason.
